direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are overridden from the Object class and provide string representations of the object.
Both methods provide string representations, but the implementation details differ.
Both methods can be used interchangeably to get a string representation of the object.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the map to be initialized before generating a string representation.
The entrySet method is used to access the entries of the map, which is necessary for generating the string representation.
Both methods need to ensure the string format is correct and handle any exceptions related to string formatting.
